title: AOD - Art Of Defense
description: AOD - Art of Defence is a casual tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As Commander of the A.O.D squad, you lead the charge against Mr. Ivil's ruthless thugs, determined to find the lost Inola project. With stunning isometric graphics, build your technological kingdoms and thwart the enemy's destructive ambitions. Will you save mankind or succumb to darkness?
